alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 10:49AM EST until January 11 at 2:18AM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Schuylkill River At Pottstown affecting Montgomery County. For the Schuylkill River...including Pottstown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Schuylkill River at Pottstown. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Sewers in the Pottstown area, due to high and backwater effects, begin to flood. At 12.5 feet, Portions of PA Route 724 along the Berks/Chester county line begin to flood, specifically Union Township in Berks county and North Coventry Township in Chester county. At 13.0 feet, Portions of PA Route 724 along the Berks/Chester county line are closed due to high water, specifically Union Township in Berks county and North Coventry Township in Chester county. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 12.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM EST Wednesday was 12.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 13.8 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 12.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.8 feet on 08/05/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Stream Fld Observed Fcsts (1 pm) Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Stg Time Date Schuylkill River Pottstown 12.5 12.9 Wed 10 a 8.1 6.2 13.8 1pm 1/10 &&
info.instruction: Turn around...don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/phi. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1100 PM EST.
